detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Founders Kirk McCormick and Jay Murphy bring over 75 years of combined legal experience to the table, specializing in personal injury law and insurance bad faith.

detailsData.title: Proven Track Record
detailsData.content: McCormick & Murphy have a history of securing significant settlements and jury awards for their clients, demonstrating their capability to handle complex cases.

detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: The firm prioritizes client satisfaction, offering personalized legal strategies and compassionate support throughout the legal process.

detailsData.title: Wide Range of Services
detailsData.content: With expertise in various personal injury cases, including auto accidents, wrongful death, and traumatic brain injuries, they provide comprehensive legal services.

address: 929 W Colorado Ave, Colorado Springs, CO 80905
valueProp: We Are Colorado Springs Personal Injury Attorneys With Over 60 Years Of Combined Legal Experience. Since 1995, We Have Recovered Millions Of Dollars For Our Colorado Clients.

testimonalData.text: In December 2009, I was injured on a dangerous, icy parking area at my mother’s condominium complex in Colorado Springs. The management of the complex had decided to not renew the snow /ice removal contract due to resident complaints.
testimonalData.author: D. G., Colorado Springs

testimonalData.text: I was in an automobile accident in 2006. As a result of the accident I received injuries to my neck and back, but I didn’t have medical insurance and didn’t have a way to get any treatment. The insurance company denied my claim, and refused to pay for my medical bills.
testimonalData.author: Katrina, Colorado Springs

testimonalData.text: After I was hit broadside by a drunk driver who had no insurance, my own insururance company would not pay for the injuries that the other driver had caused. Not only that, they refused to pay my medical bills, and would not send me the forms that I needed to fill out.
testimonalData.author: Sally, Denver
